content.html: Dressing your children up as Johnny Depp and Amber Heard for Halloween is sending a very strong message to them that you think domestic & sexual abuse is funny, trivial, and that you don’t believe victims. Great parenting.
content.value:
Dressing your children up as Johnny Depp and Amber Heard for Halloween is sending a very strong message to them that you think domestic & sexual abuse is funny, trivial, and that you don’t believe victims.

Great parenting.
